Zend repo Path = 
	http://framework.zend.com/svn/framework/standard/branches/release-{$zBranch}
		/library/Zend@{$zRev}

The URL above should be all on one line, I've wrapped it for readability.

The 'Zend tag' value is the latest tag release of Zend on our release date.

I've used the value of 'Zend tag' to discover the revision to peg to.

Pegged revision suggestion is the last change to the /library/Zend folder.

+-------------+-------------+-------+----------+-------------------+
| Tiki Branch | Zend Branch | Zend  | Zend rev | Tiki release date |
|             | {$zBranch}  | tag   | {$zRev}  |                   |
+-------------+-------------+-------+----------+-------------------+
| 6.0         | 1.11        | 0     | 23264    | 10/11/2010        |
| 6.1         | 1.11        | 1     | 23455    | 15/12/2010        |
| 6.2         | 1.11        | 3     | 23684    | 22/02/2011        |
| 6.3         | 1.11        | 5     | 23849    | 13/04/2011        |
| 6.4         | 1.11        | 9     | 24242    | 15/07/2011        |
| 6.5         | 1.11        | 11    | 24483    | 09/12/2011        |
| 6.6         | 1.11        | 11    | 24483    | 07/01/2012        |
| 6.7         | 1.11        | 11    | 24483    | 06/04/2012        |
| 6.8         | 1.12        | 0     | 25049    | 25/10/2012        |
| 6.9         | 1.12        | 1     | 25165    | 21/12/2012        |
| 6.10        | 1.12        | 1     | 25165    | 08/02/2013        |
| 6.x         | 1.12        | 1     | 25165    |                   |
+-------------+-------------+-------+----------+-------------------+
| 7.0beta1    | 1.11        | 5     | 23849    | 23/04/2011        |
| 7.0beta2    | 1.11        | 6     | 24016    | 16/05/2011        |

| 7.x         | 1.12        | 1     | 25165    |                   |
